pageTitle: eXtreme Unit Buttons : Action Bar Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {15412=This highly configurable mod allows players to associate buttons to unit frames. It is meant as a replacement to GroupButtons which stopped functioning with the 2.0 patch in December 2006. The mod extends the capabilities of GroupButtons by providing these additional features:}
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (2) XPerl's partypets get no buttons Known problems: Please refer to 'z_historic_Changelog.txt' for older changes. !!! Improved: Internals are mostly rewritten from scratch for better performance !!! And last but not least: Improved: Verification of buttons while configuring the addon Example: /target [target=unit#] Here unit# will be rpalced at runtime with the unit the button is attached to. New: Macro buttons support now '[target=unit#]' New: Spell ranks have been removed (multiranking too) This button will be hidden on hostile units (= it will only be shown on friendly units) Example: MyGroupName,SB_Renew,*,hostile 'hostile' and 'friendly' New: two keywords for exclude-units: A button with this condition is only shown if the destination unit has at least one buff to purge. New: new debuff condition "Purge" A button with this condition is only shown if the destination unit is dead. New: new debuff condition "Death" New: '!' inverts conditions for cast buttons (buff, debuff etc.) This custom buutton will only chnge to the state BUFFED if the destination unit is buffed with your OWN Renew. Example: CB_Renew,buff,Renew,$Renew New: '$' self condition for cast buttons (buff,
